author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
It's our first live stream of 2026! Adam will be taking Tested member questions with no particular theme. Note that during live streams, Tested memberships are gifted. Join us for the next live stream and be sure you're signed into your YouTube account and you've opted to receive gifted memberships! YouTube randomly assigns gifts to people logged in and watching.  Instructions are on this page (https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6304294 -- just scroll to "opt in and get gifted memberships."  Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam questions: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join
Tested and Adam Savage Ts, stickers, (de) merit badges and more: https://tested-store.com
title: Adam Savage's Live Streams: Wednesday, Jan 7, at 1 pm PT

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How did knights protect their horses in battle? At @metmuseum, assistant curator Marina Viallon takes #AdamSavage through some EXTRAORDINARY examples of medieval horse armor, including this headpieces that covered the horse's eyes completely! 

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
title: This Medieval War Horse Couldn’t SEE

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Every bit as iconic as the Batsuit in Tim Burton's Batman films is Jack Nicholson's portrayal of the Joker. And in the collection of Propstore founder Stephen Lane is one of the original Joker costumes worn for the film. Vibrant and rich with detail, this costume is perhaps the definitive take on the clown prince of crime. 

The Last Surviving Batsuits from Batman (1989): https://youtu.be/TRDaDsPgfhk
Learn more about Propstore's collection and upcoming auctions at: https://propstoreauction.com/

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: The Original Joker Costume from Batman (1989)!
